English: League of Nations Cooldown
We must wait some time before addressing the League again
League of Nations Memeber (Founding Memeber)

Following the end of the last Great War, our nation became a founding memeber of the League of Nations. As such, we enjoy increased prestige, enhanced diplomatic opportunities, and improved international relations.
League of Nations Memeber
We have acceded to the League of Nations. it offers us enhanced diplomatic opportunities, and improved international relations.
Head of the British Commonwealth of Nations
Our position as head of the commonwealth bolsters our global influence. The role also implies certain responsibilities and expectations in terms of diplomacy and defense commitments.
Memeber of the British Commonwealth of Nations
This nation is a member of the British Commonwealth of Nations, a political association of memebers of the British Empire.
Defacto Leader of the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere

This Nation is a member of the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere. This country has found its self to be the defacto leader and dominates the group.  The organisation is nationalist in nature and will fight European colonial dominance in the East.
Member of the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere
This Nation is a member of the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere. The organisation is nationalist in nature and will fight European colonial dominance in the East.
Signatory of the Anti-Comintern Pact
We are signatories to the Anti-Comintern Pact. We will take all actions to oppose the spread of communism around the world.
Memeber of the Fascist International Congress
We have joined the Fascist International Congress. The world must revolve around the strength of nations such as ourselves.
Memebr of the Communist International
We have joined the Communist International. We shall help liberate the enslaved masses of the capitalist world and foster socialist utopia amoungst our comrade nations.
Member of the League of Nations
This Nation is a member of the League of Nations. We may want to take this into account diplomaticaly.
Member of the British Commonwealth of Nations
This Nation is a member of the British Commonwealth of Nations. These countries can be expected to coordinate their economies and diplomacy.
Member of the Zollervein Customs Union
This Nation is a member of the Zollervein Customs Union. These countries can be expected to coordinate their economic policy.
Member of the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere
This country member of the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere. The organisation is nationalist in nature and will fight European colonial dominance in the East.
Signatory of the Anti-Comintern Pact
As a signatory to the Anti-Comintern Pact this nation will coordinate with fellow signatories to undermine foreign ideologies. They will also coordinate military and state security.
Memeber of the Fascist International Congress
By joining the Fascist International Congress this country will prioritise its own nationalist values and those of its allies (or at least while it is convenient).
Memeber of the Latin Monetary Union
As a member of the Latin Monetary Union this country coordinates currency and economic matters with other member states.
Memebr of the Communist International
This country will work will other communist states to promote communism globaly and protect internal security and foreign interests of the block.
British Empire Games
The city is currently hosting the British Empire (Later Commonwealth) Games. A boom to local business.
The Imperial Conference of $YEAR$

The world is not what it was. At the recent Imperial Conference in London a proposal has been suggested. The Balfour Declaration would declare the United Kingdom and the Dominions to be autonomous Communities within the British Empire, equal in status, in no way subordinate one to another in any aspect of their domestic or external affairs, though united by a common allegiance to the Crown, and freely associated as members of the British Commonwealth of Nations. Perhaps it is time to re-examine our relationships with our Empire?
If you love it you should let it go.
Not in my Dominions!
The $YEAR$ Emergency London Conference

The world is not what it was. Our recent loss in the Great War has shattered the British Empire. Some of our former subjects have come to us with a suggestion. By creating a Commonwealth of British States we can at least salvage some of our global influence.
We should do what we can.
Empire was a mistake.
Our Place in the Empire
London has suggested we take part in the Balfour Declaration. By doing this we would be joining the British Commonwealth of States, to help foster relations and development within the empire!
We take our place in the empire.
We go it alone.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Joins the British Commonwealth
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has acceded to the British Commonwealth of Nations!
Good for them.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Rejects the Commonwealth
$FROMCOUNTRY$ does not recognise the value of the Commonwealth!
We can go without them.
MONARCHYPLACEHOLDER (Commonwealth in Canada Event)
MONARCHYPLACEHOLDER!
MONARCHYPLACEHOLDER.
MONARCHYPLACEHOLDER.
1st British Empire Games
Commonwealth diplomats have suggested Hamilton for the first British Empire Games. This would be a boom to local business and improve our Commonwealth reputation!
A great opportunity to showcase Canada.
We have not the funds or time for this.
1st British Empire Games
Canada is hosting the first Empire Games in Hamilton. Should we fund a team?
Yes!
We have not the funds or time for this.
1st British Empire Games
Commonwealth diplomats have suggested $CAPITAL$ for the first British Empire Games. This would be a boom to local business and improve our Commonwealth reputation!
A great opportunity to showcase $CAPITAL$.
We have not the funds or time for this.
1st British Empire Games in $FROMCOUNTRY$
$FROMCOUNTRY$ is hosting the first Empire Games in their Capital. Should we fund a team?
Yes!
We have not the funds or time for this.
2nd British Empire Games
Commonwealth diplomats have suggested London for the second British Empire Games. This would be a boom to local business and improve our Commonwealth reputation!
A great opportunity to showcase London.
We have not the funds or time for this.
2nd British Empire Games
The United Kingdom is hosting the first Empire Games in London. Should we fund a team?
Yes!
We have not the funds or time for this.
2nd British Empire Games
Commonwealth diplomats have suggested $CAPITAL$ for the second British Empire Games. This would be a boom to local business and improve our Commonwealth reputation!
A great opportunity to showcase $CAPITAL$.
We have not the funds or time for this.
2nd British Empire Games in $FROMCOUNTRY$
$FROMCOUNTRY$ is hosting the second Empire Games in their Capital. Should we fund a team?
Yes!
We have not the funds or time for this.
Ejected from the Commonwealth
Due to our political developments we have been ejected from the Commonwealth.
Do we need em!
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Applies for Commonwealth
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has asked to join the Commonwealth, should we allow them into the organisation?
A Welcome Addition!
They are not the right sort.
Accepted to the Commonwealth
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has welcomed our request to join the Commonwealth, we can welcome our future development together!
Simply Smashing!
Rejected by Commonwealth
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has not welcomed our request to join the Commonwealth, we are not considered close enough.
Damn.
Accepted to the Commonwealth
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has been accepted in Commonwealth, we can look forward our future development together!
Simply Smashing!
Rejected by Commonwealth
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has been refused entry to the Commonwealth.
Unfortunate for Them.
Found the League of Nations
Our recent way has been a war to end all wars. We have the opportunity to create an organisation eo ensure peace in our time.
This is the right thing to do
We can ensure our own security
Found the League of Nations
Following the recent Great War, the victorious powers have created a organisation to foster international relations. Is this in our interest?.
Peace in our time!
Not worth it.
Special Session on $THIS$
The League of Nations have convened a special setion on our position within the Legaue. Unless a sufficent number of nations consider us worthwhile, we may be ejected from the League!
We did nothing wrong.
Special Session on $FROMCOUNTRY$

The League of Nations have convened a special setion on $FROMCOUNTRY$ and their position within the Legaue. Given their recent behavior, they may not longer be worthy such a seat on international affairs!
Everyone makes mistakes.
They had it coming.
Special Session on $THIS$
The vote failed! We remain within the League of Nations.
We knew it was fine.
Special Session on $THIS$
The vote passed! We have been betrayed by the international community.
Oof.
Accession of $FROMCOUNTRY$
$FROMCOUNTRY$ wishes to accede to the League of Nations. Do we consider $FROMCOUNTRY$ to be mature enough to the join the league?
The mpre the merrier.
No way that is a real place.
Accession of $THIS$
The vote past! We have accended the League of Nations.
Wonderful.
Accession of $THIS$
The vote failed! We do not have the respect of international community.
Oof.
Accession of $FROMCOUNTRY$
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has accended the League of Nations.
Very well.
Accession of $FROMCOUNTRY$
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has not been accepted to the League of Nations.
Maybe next time.
The Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere

Our acedemics have formulated a great idea. By creating a organisation to promote nationalist values in Asia we can further our interests in the region and create difficulty to the imperialistic powers of the west.
Asia for Asiatics!
We have no interest in other states.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ for the Co-Prosperity Sphere

Key: EVTDESC71071$FROMCOUNTRY$ wishes to accede to be part of the Co-Prosperity Sphere. Do we consider $FROMCOUNTRY$ to be worthy of our organisation?

English: They will be useful.
They matter little.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ and the Co-Prosperity Sphere
We have been accepted! We will share in the progress of Asia.
Very good.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ and the Co-Prosperity Sphere
We have been rejected.
Whos prosperity is it anyway.
$THIS$ and the Co-Prosperity Sphere
We have been ejected from the Sphere!
Whos prosperity is it anyway.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has joined the Co-Prosperity Sphere!
We can look to work together in the future.
Lets hope they behave themselves
$FROMCOUNTRY$ was Rejected by The Co-Prosperity Sphere
It has been decidied that $FROMCOUNTRY$ has no place in the Co-Prosperity sphere.
Oh no!
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Kicked from the Co-Prosperity Sphere!
The behavior of $FROMCOUNTRY$ has become too much to bear, they have been ejected from the Co-Prosperity sphere.
It had to be done
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Has Left The Co-Prosperity Sphere
They feel our allaince is not in their best interest.
We will show them
The Creation of the Co-Prosperity Sphere
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has invisiaged a organisation of countries to repulse the white mans rule in asia. While presented as a union of equals, they retain tight control over the running of the group.
This is for us
I don't trust it as far as I could throw it
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Joins the Co-Prosperity Sphere

We've received news that $FROMCOUNTRY$ has joined the ranks of the Co-Prosperity Sphere. This collective effort for mutual prosperity and security continues to grow stronger, as more nations recognize the benefits of cooperation and shared growth.
Welcome them to the Sphere.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ refuses Co-Prosperity Sphere
Unfortunately, our diplomatic efforts to expand the Co-Prosperity Sphere have been met with resistance. $FROMCOUNTRY$ declined to join us in our endeavor for shared prosperity and security.
We respect their decision.
The Foundation of the Anti-Comintern Pact

With the growing influence of Communist ideology in many parts of the world, it may be in our best interest to form an international alliance to counteract this threat. The creation of the Anti-Comintern Pact could serve as a strong deterrent against the spread of Communism and provide mutual defense (and control) of its members.
Establish the Anti-Comintern Pact
Refrain from forming the Pact at this time
Invitation to the Anti-Comintern Pact

We have received an invitation to join the Anti-Comintern Pact, a collective defense against the spread of Communism. Joining this pact could strengthen our international standing and provide us with valuable allies, but it could also draw us into conflict with Communist nations. The decision lies before us.
Accept the invitation and join the Pact
Decline the invitation at this time
Expulsion from the Anti-Comintern

We have received troubling news. Our nation has been expelled from the Anti-Comintern, the international Anti-Communist alliance. This is a significant setback for our diplomatic standing and our position on the global stage. We must decide how to move forward.
Stand strong and continue on our own path
Anti-Comintern Membership Vote on $FROMCOUNTRY$

A contentious issue has arisen within the Anti-Comintern. $FROMCOUNTRY$ is under scrutiny, and we have been asked to cast our vote on whether they should remain in our international Anti-Communist alliance. This decision could have significant diplomatic implications.
Vote in favor of their continued membership
Vote for their expulsion from the Anti-Comintern
Comintern Vote Results: Our Membership Maintained

The votes have been counted, and the decision is in our favor: we will not be expelled from the Anti-Comintern. We remain part of this international Anti-Communist alliance, despite the controversies.
Celebrate our victory
Anti-Comintern Vote Results: Our Expulsion Enacted
The verdict is in: we have been expelled from the Anti-Comintern. Our actions have led us to this moment, and now we must face the diplomatic consequences.
Contemplate our next steps
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Wishes to Join the Anti-Comintern
As a member of the pact, you are now required to vote on whether they should be accepted as a new member.
Vote to Approve
Vote to Reject
Successful Application to Join the Anti-Comintern Pact

We are pleased to announce our successful application to join the Anti-Comintern Pact. This is a significant milestone for our nation as we embrace the opportunity to strengthen our alliances and collaborate with like-minded nations. Together, we will face the challenges ahead.
We Embrace the Opportunity
Membership Denied in the Anti-Comintern Pact
Regrettably, our application to join the Anti-Comintern Pact has been denied. we are disappointed by this outcome and the missed chances for closer cooperation with other member states.
We Seek Other Collaborations
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Ascends to New Heights
The nation of [Country Name] proudly announces its ascension to the Anti-Comintern Pact..
I see
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Fails to Ascend to Anti-Comintern Pact
The vote rejected $FROMCOUNTRY$.
Oh well
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Maintains Membership
$FROMCOUNTRY$ proudly announces its continued membership in the Anti-Comintern Pact. This decision reaffirms the nation's commitment to the alliance and its shared values.
Very Well
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Expelled from the Anti-Comintern Pact

We inform you of $FROMCOUNTRY$'s expulsion from the Anti-Comintern Pact. Due to alleged violations of the pact's principles and obligations, the member states have collectively decided to terminate $FROMCOUNTRY$'s membership. This turn of events necessitates a reassessment of our foreign policy.
Ok
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Withdraws from the Anti-Comintern Pact

$FROMCOUNTRY$ has made the decision to withdraw from the Anti-Comintern Pact. The government of $FROMCOUNTRY$ cites its evolving foreign policy and national interests as reasons for this departure. This development may have implications for diplomatic relations and regional dynamics.
Blast
Founding of the Fascist International Title

The time has come to establish the Fascist International, an alliance of like-minded nations guided by the principles of fascism. This organization aims to foster collaboration, promote ideological unity, and advance the shared goals of member states. With this momentous decision, a new era of cooperation among fascist nations begins.
Create the Fascist International
Don't Create the Fascist International
Invitation to Join the Fascist International Title

$FROMCOUNTRY$ has created a organisation to promote global fascism. This alliance of like-minded nations seeks to promote fascist ideology, foster cooperation, and achieve common goals. Membership in the Fascist International would open doors to increased collaboration and shared prosperity.
Join the Fascist International
Don't Join the Fascist International
Expulsion from the Fascist International

The leadership of the Fascist International is considering expeling $FROMCOUNTRY$ from the alliance. This decision comes as a result of perceived deviations from the core principles and objectives of the organization.
Its Time
Vote on $FROMCOUNTRY$'s Place in the Fascist International

Members of the Fascist International are called upon to vote on whether $FROMCOUNTRY$ should remain a member of the alliance. We must consider their contributions, adherence to principles, and alignment as we cast out vote.
Vote to Keep Them In
Vote to Kick Tehm Out
We Avoid Expulsion From the Fascist International
News! The Fascist International has decided not to kick us out. Our continued membership in the alliance has been secured.
We knewn we were worthy
We Are Expelled from the Fascist International
The Fascist International has chosen to kick us out of the alliance. We will regroup.
Damn and Blast
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Wishes to Join the Fascist International
A decision has been made by $FROMCOUNTRY$ to apply for membership in the organization. Now, the members must vote on whether to accept them into the alliance.
Vote to Approve Membership
Vote to Deny Membership
Membership to the Fascist International
News! Our application for membership in the organization has been accepted. The future holds promising opportunities for us.
It is our natural place
Our Membership Application is Unsuccessful
Regrettably, our application for membership in the Fascist International has been rejected.
We Are Not Happy About It
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Accepted into the Fascist International
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has ascended to the Fascist International. They stand proud as an esteemed member of the alliance, ready to further contribute to the goals and ideals of Fascism.
Wunderbar
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Rejected from the Fascist International
Despite their aspirations, $FROMCOUNTRY$ has not been able to ascend to the Fascist International.
Very Well
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Remains in the Fascist International

Following the vote, $FROMCOUNTRY$ has managed to maintain its membership within the Fascist International. They remain part of the alliance, committed to the principles and objectives of fascism. They express gratitude for the support received from fellow members and vow to continue their active participation in the organization.
We will see how long it lasts
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Ejected from the Fascist International
The vote has resulted in $FROMCOUNTRY$'s expulsion from the Fascist International. This decision marks a significant setback for their involvement in the alliance.
It is for the best
$FROMCOUNTRY$'s Departure from the Fascist International
$FROMCOUNTRY$ announces its decision to leave the Fascist International. This departure signifies a shift in their priorities and ideological alignment.
Reactions to the News
Ascend To The British Commonwealth of Nations
As a nation touched by British culture we may be considered a reasonable candidate for the British Commonwealth of Nations. This will give us more diplomatic opportunities and bonuses.
Ascend To The British Commonwealth of Nations
As a nation touched by British culture we may be considered a reasonable candidate for the British Commonwealth of Nations. This will give us more diplomatic opportunities and bonuses.
Withdraw from The British Commonwealth of Nations
If the Commonwealth no longer serves out interest, perhaps we have the option to withdraw.
Ascend To The Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere
The injustices of colonial powers in the east cannot continue. This organisation will help us resist their imperialistic aims.
Withdraw from The Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere
Perhaps the westernsers weren't the only imperialistic ones after all.
Ascend To The Anti-Comintern Pact

We have decided to ascend to the Anti-Comintern Pact. By joining this alliance, we align ourselves with like-minded nations and commit to a common cause. Together, we will strengthen our diplomatic ties and stand united against common adversaries.
Withdraw from The Anti-Comintern Pact
After careful consideration, we have decided to withdraw from the Anti-Comintern Pact. This decision reflects a shift in our foreign policy priorities.
Ascend To The Fascist International

We can apply to ascend to the Fascist International. By joining this alliance, we align ourselves with like-minded nations and embrace the principles of fascism. Together, we will promote our shared ideology, foster collaboration, and work towards our collective goals.
Withdraw from The Fascist International
We can withdraw from the Fascist International. This decision might reflect a shift in our priorities and a divergence from the principles of the alliance.
Ascend To The Comintern

We could try ascend to the Comintern. By joining this alliance of socialist and communist nations, we would align ourselves with the principles of international solidarity and anti-imperialism. Together, work towards the advancement of workers' rights, social justice, and the liberation of oppressed peoples.
Withdraw from The Comintern
We could withdraw from the Comintern. This decision might reflect a shift in our priorities and a divergence from the principles of the alliance.
